form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to modify the standard of visual acuity required for eligibility for specially adapted housing assistance provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Blinded Veterans Adaptive Housing Improvement Act of 2010.

section.header: Modification of standard of visual acuity required for eligibility for specially adapted housing assistance provided by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs

subsection.text: Section 2101(b)(2)(A) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking 5/200 visual acuity or less and inserting 20/200 best corrected visual acuity or less or a peripheral field of 20 degrees or less.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to specially adapted housing assistance provided on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
